entry.content:
##Day 1

  • Visit private bank room + Join a regular meeting
  • Read PPT ("Shenzhen Branch bank course," "Introduction of products independently developed by private bank," "Operation practice of private bank", Caizhihui)
  • Read "Wealth Consultant"Ôºà„ÄäË¥¢ÂØåÈ°æÈóÆ„ÄãÔºâ -> Post qualification certification examination series teaching material
  • Wang Xing always thinks that finance is divided into three levels: banks -> securities companies/fund companies -> investment banks; Suggest me to take the CFA test
  • China Merchants Bank has done well in facing young people, while ABC traditionally focuses on rural areas, so urban ABCs (eg. Shenzhen has no rural areas) faces a difficult situation

‚ö†Ô∏èTips:

  • Understand the concept: I said I have some understanding of the fund, such as the concept of retracement, Wang Xing asked me its definition but I could not respond clearly, saying that it was a loss of money...(in fact it's the magnitude of the fluctuation)
  • Close the door after everyone when you arrive at the regular meeting
  • Bring cell phone with me in case I need to add others' WeChat (I forgot it when I went to see the boss)

‚è∞Tasks after class:
Wang:

  • What is a fund like learning
  • Household asset allocation reports

Liu:

  • Financial Intelligence Publicity Program
  • Marketing hot spots in the next four months

Tomorrow:

  1. Remember to bring a pillow
  2. Check news on apps everyday

##Day 2

  • Learn Excel: VLOOKUP (match data) & PivotTable (compare and analyze)
  • There's a "Party Building" activity today, stuffs from each branch bank came to perform and make speech
  • Learn about stock and fund (read books & make mindmap)
  • Modify the advertisement of "Caizhihui," which will be sent through Wechat Official Account tomorrow
  • There is a good design company called "Start-up Salad."

‚ö†Ô∏èTips

  • company culture: Weekly 3-mile run + send picture to the group chat.
  • I forgot to bring my ID card and converter again!

##Day 3

  • Morning: Met Client with Mrs. Na (who does trust) at Longgang. She is about 40, works in Pingan insurance, has a son. Her husband works in PE. She doesn't really want to buy trust but more about learning it as a a person of the same trade or business (Mrs. Na told me later and said she realized this soon). They discussed about their children first (three people: Mrs. Na, the Client Mrs. Liu, and the head of this brank bank Mrs. Wu, all of which have a child in high school). I find it really interesting because in China many discussion start with children. Mrs. Na said in China Family trust really started in 2018.
    • Wealth management may be a good future career choice.
    • Tea & jewelry are popular topics in China.
    • Many senior executives tend to avoid chosing the finance products of their own companies for** [privacy]**‚ùï
  • Discussed Fund with Wang and was assigned new topics (the difference between private and public offering funds; automatic investment plan)
  • Got my fund account, which means I can really buy my 1st fund next week! (üòÑmy first step towards investment coming SOON!)
